div.h3: Lexington City School Board Meeting (Public Viewing Link)

p.span: Virtual Board Meeting scheduled for Tuesday April 21, 2020 @ 6:30PM
Please click the link below to access the board meeting:

span.style: color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 14.66px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;
span.span: For the most up-to-date information please follow our Facebook Page: www.facebook.com/LCSSTN

span.style: color: #1d2129; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-align: center;

p.span: For information and updates for all of Henderson County, please visit the Henderson County Strong Site: hendersoncoutnystrong.com

p.style: margin: 0pt 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-size: 12.8013px; vertical-align: baseline; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; color: #666666; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: center; line-height: 1.38;

span.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-size: 14.66px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent; color: #000000; font-family: Arial;

p.span: The 1:1 Initiative at LCSS is a great opportunity for fourth through eighth grade students. LCSS students will gain technology and communication skills that will enable them to learn, grow, and lead in a global world. This initiative will extend the opportunity for children to learn about technology in a supervised and controlled environment and to practice appropriate digital citizenship skills opening up a world of learning everywhere they go. As such, we have secured #learningeverywherewego to help capture our journey as we embark on this 1:1 Initiative together.

p.style: margin: 0pt 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-size: 12.8013px; vertical-align: baseline; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; color: #666666; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: center; line-height: 1.38;

span.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-size: 14.66px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent; color: #000000; font-family: Arial;

p.span: To find out more CLICK HERE.
